title: Air Products and Chemicals ' sales 2009 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 9674.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 7504.0 was reached at Year 2016
